game.name: Jasper's Dream
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Jasper's Dream is a first person puzzle game set in a techno mystic Egyptian world. Help Jasper, a robot programmed to create games, by solving his mind-bending puzzles. You will also explore an abandonned futuristic pyramid and unravel its many mysteries.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Jasper's Dream is a first person puzzle game set in a techno mystic Egyptian world. Help Jasper, a robot programmed to create games, by solving his mind-bending puzzles. You will also explore an abandonned futuristic pyramid and unravel its many mysteries.
